snippet: The cancellation of the league’s signature event, which was to be held on Jan. 1, was the latest and most significant result of the nearly seven-week lockout.
abstract: NHL cancels the Winter Classic, league's signature outdoor event; decision is latest and most significant result of the nearly seven-week lockout.
lead_paragraph: The cancellation of the league’s signature event, which was to be held on Jan. 1, was the latest and most significant result of the nearly seven-week lockout.

headline.main: Citing Logistics, N.H.L. Cancels Winter Classic
headline.print_headline: Citing Logistics, N.H.L. Cancels Winter Classic
